column4: I'm switching a friend from Vista to ubuntu, We've tried out Intrepid but his screen resolution is stuck at 800x600, he has an Acer Aspire 5520, does anyone know if we'll have that problem in Jaunty??? Thanks.

I'm switching a friend from Vista to ubuntu, We've tried out Intrepid but his screen resolution is stuck at 800x600, he has an Acer Aspire 5520, does anyone know if we'll have that problem in Jaunty??? Thanks.
